rows.label: qev041402_MSG0001
rows.name:
Phew! It was real hassle dragging Elder Nan
all the way out here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0002
rows.name:
Somehow Elder Nan too sick and frail to move,
but still has energy for massive tantrum...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0003
rows.name:
Quiet! *cough* *cough* Nobody going to send up
fireworks for old Nan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0004
rows.name: It fine... Nan will just disappear here... Alone...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Right, human friend? Nopon in each caravan not
care about Nan at all, did they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0006
rows.name:
Nan knew it! ...Knew, but still would have preferred
that friend pad truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0007
rows.name:
Meh! Save your lies. Nan knows no one has use
for him anymore...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0008
rows.name:
Almost time! Then we see proof that everyone still
cares. ...At least somewhat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0009
rows.name: *cough* *hack* Hmph...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0010
rows.name: Popote hungry again, Grampypon. Got any food?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0011
rows.name:
This is very important moment for Nan!
Shut your trap for five minutes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0012
rows.name:
But Popote not care about fireworks at all.
Popote only care for food...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0013
rows.name: Oh-ho-hoooooo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0014
rows.name: Th-that... Ahhhh...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0015
rows.name:
See? None of them left because they not like Nan
anymore![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0016
rows.name: *cough* But they DID leave Nan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0017
rows.name:
...No. They were right. Nopon are traveling people.
Journey is in blood of all Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0018
rows.name:
Nan was fool to forget something so basic.
...Also to talk nonsense about wanting to disappear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0019
rows.name:
Other Nopon are out there in dangerous lands
working hard to make business flourish.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0020
rows.name:
Enough monologuing, Grampypon! Foooood!
Fireworks not fill empty belly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0021
rows.name: Rrgh! Hush up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0022
rows.name:
Plot of Ngogo worked like charm. Now that Nan
cheered up, Ngogo won't have to listen to annoying
complaints![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0023
rows.name: Thank you, friend! Here is payment as agreed upon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0024
rows.name:
Phew! It was a real hassle dragging Elder Nan out
here with him clinging to Pisa like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0025
rows.name:
Somehow Nan too sick and frail to move,
but still has energy to shamelessly flirt...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0026
rows.name:
Quiet! *cough* *hurf* Nobody going to send up
fireworks for old Nan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0027
rows.name:
It fine... Nan will just disappear with only an
occasional Pisa grope for comfort...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0028
rows.name:
...Right, human friend? Nopon in each caravan not
care about Nan at all, did they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev041402_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod and tell Nan that he's correct.

rows.label: qev041402_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev041402_SEL0041
rows.name: Cheer Nan up by saying that everyone loves him.

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0029
rows.name:
Nan knew it! ...Knew, but still would have preferred
that friend pad truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0030
rows.name:
Meh! Save your lies. Nan knows no one has use
for him anymore...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0031
rows.name:
Almost time! Then we see proof that everyone still
cares. ...At least somewhat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0032
rows.name: *cough* *hack* Hmph...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0033
rows.name: Ah! That sound of fireworks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0034
rows.name: Th-that... Ahhhh...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0035
rows.name: Eeep![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041402_MSG0036
rows.name:
Wait. That firework come from caravan of Pisa!
What in the world...?[ST:wait ]
